request.description: Authenticates the user and returns the user's API token.
Signs out the user and destroys the API token.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by status code: A, C, H, X.
Filter by title. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Creates a new ticket record. Users can only create tickets for themselves. Managers can create tickets for any user.

request.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.
Replace the specified ticket in storage.
Update the specified ticket in storage.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by name. Wildcards are supported.
Filter by email. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Retrieves all tickets created by a specific user.
Creates a ticket for the specific user.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by status name. Wildcards are supported.
Filter by email. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Retrieves all users that created a ticket.
Retrieves all users that created a ticket.
